entry.def: Something that is sparse is small in number or amount and spread out over an area.

example.ex: Many slopes are rock fields with sparse vegetation...
example.tran: 许多山坡都是石头地，植被稀疏。

example.ex: He was a tubby little man in his fifties, with sparse hair...
example.tran: 他50来岁，头发稀疏，身材矮胖。
